author: greenwichtime
title: Africans in China evicted, refused entry to restaurants in xenophobic campaign...
description: Africans living in the southern Chinese city of Guangzhou say they have been evicted from their apartments and refused entry to restaurants as part of a xenophobic campaign against black people that is ostensibly aimed at curbing the transmission of coronavir…
content: Africans in China allege racism as fear of new virus cases unleashes xenophobia In this Thursday, Aug. 11, 2016, photo, a shop sells t-shirts catering to the local African communities in Guangzhou in southern China's Guangdong province. (AP Photo/Louise Watt)… [+7886 chars]
